metadata.name: No Praise ☷
metadata.description:
A collaboration between musician, how about here., and visual artist, Ross McCampbell.

The minted NFT functions as a commemorative distillation of the audio track, “No Praise”, extracting a 24-second video loop from the original work. 

Edition 1 of 1

Size: 2600px2600px 
Format: mp4
Length: 0:24
